title: Chocolate orange cheesecake
ingredients: ['Base', '125g digestive biscuit crumbs', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '75g butter, melted', 'Filling', '110g plain chocolate, chopped', '675g cream cheese, softened', '200g caster sugar', '5 eggs', '2 tablespoons orange juice', '1/2 teaspoon orange zest']
